characters.story: "DEE!" the tiger and road command sharply - to hand over, deliver, and pass the smoke and drink!
The tiger and male with brains hanging out bend down drooping - to take captive, capture as prisoner.
"NYUEH!" the tiger and backward broom command sharply - despotic, cruel to mistreat!
"FOO!" the flesh sings cheerfully - skin, epidermis, and surface!
"LOO?" he questions curiously - the Louvre, museum?
"LOO?" the fire and Louvre question curiously - a stove, furnace with hot pebbles!
"LOO?" the flowers and Louvre question curiously - reeds, marsh plants?
"LYOO?" the horse and Louvre question curiously - a donkey, stubborn ass?
"KWAY!" it sings cheerfully despite loss, deficit, and damage!
"WOO!" the water sings cheerfully - filthy, dirty to pollute!
"UH!" the state of mind, chatterbox, and snake hook command sharply - stunned and shocked!
"KWAH!" the words sing cheerfully - to brag, boast, and exaggerate the rumor!
The soil and blowhard bend down drooping - to collapse, crumble, and fail.
"KWAH!" the wooden leg and blowhard command sharply - to straddle, span, and cross!
"SHYEN!" the dog commands sharply - to donate, offer, and contribute to school!
"RUNG?" he questions curiously - to melt, dissolve in gene fusion?
"GUH?" the pinnacle questions curiously - to separate, isolate the hospital?
"LYOO!" the water and ponder command sharply - to filter, strain, and sieve!
